ISSUE.TITLE: Faroe Islands are not a part of the EU
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: `https://restcountries.eu/rest/v2/regionalbloc/eu` lists Faroe Islands as part of the EU. Wikipedia says the following and it seems to be right in this case: > As explicitly asserted by both treaties of the European Union, the Faroe Islands are not part of the European Union.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: PR #257 Updating North Macedonia Fixes #245 Fixes #199 Fixes #178 Fixes #117 Supersedes #227

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Faroe islands are not part of EU Fixes https://github.com/apilayer/restcountries/issues/184
